channel.title: How to make server online?
channel.description: I've been working all day making my server and it's finally finished... Now idk how to make it online :\.. can any1 link me to a thread telling me how?

item.title: How to make server online?
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

run.bat noob…

jk bro, deans right though, and then run.bat and leave the window minimized in your task bar! Walla! Or, you could run it hiddenly, so Ur servers on, but you cant see it on your task bar tray so no one on your computer can “accidentally” exit it out of it. If you need one lemme know, ill make you one, extremely easy to code in.

Sorry got a bit off topic.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make server online?
item.dc:creator: @iTz_Karma iTz Karma
item.description:
@iTz_Karma wrote:

^^^^Basically what he said. Go into the “Server Tutorial” section and look for how to port-forward. It’s actually a lot less complicated than people make it out to be =\

Read full topic

item.title: How to make server online?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

just look up how to port forward then make a no-ip and change the ip in your client to your no-ip.

Read full topic
